entries.body:
Changes

  • Added support for mods (fabric loader)
  • Updated React to version 18

Changes

  • Added community tab option
  • Added duplicate, open logs and total play time to profiles
  • Fixed translations in some places
  • Added play button (no dropdown yet)
  • Fixed save dir input and browse button

Changes

  • Added launcher changelog dialog (What's New).
  • Added version patch notes.
  • Installations can now be edited.
  • Added search in installations.
  • Added version section in settings. Delete a version so it will be redownloaded again.
  • About page updated.
  • Fixed dropdowns.

Changes

  • Layout similar to the Minecraft Launcher.
  • Added Keep Launcher open while running game option.
  • Added about page.
